column5: I heard that Roy got some sweet deals at the top show in La Belle Province.  I think some photos of your haul are de rigeur, n'est-ce pas?

OK, OK this is what I PM'd almost verbatim this morning. Expletives removed. Did the Montreal Sportsman's Show yesterday, We didn't stay too long..I was too darned embarrassed. We go to a sportsman's show...to look at the sportsmans stuff and what does J do?? She buys bed sheets and the buggers put them in a clear plastic bag so everyone can see what I bought and what sport I'm into. When you go to a sportsman's show it's normal to have a reel, some lures or even a freakin' moose head in your baggage....NOT BED LINENS! The worst part was saying hello to Mercer and Campeau before their seminar...as we were talking they kept glancing down at what was in the bag I was holding. Got the distinct impression they wanted to wear gloves before shaking my hand.....freakin' weird.....like I was a leper or something....  For those of you who don't know, this is a pillow case.....didn't want to take everything out and have to fold it up again.    I hope all y'all are happy now.
OMG...sorry bud. Jeez, sometimes women just don't stop to think about the implications of what they are doing.
Got some rose petals and a couple candles to go with those ?
being more of a sportsman between the sheets isnt THAT bad is it?
nice to meet ya roy...i didnt notice them bed sheets, thats why you didnt stay too long to chat
Yeah blame J will ya!! You bought those linens.
No Pete, I only paid for them.

Roy, Don't feel alone..... I think the same guy was at the London fishing show selling those sheets in clear plastic bags...He must of been doing well cause there was a line up at his booth most of the time I was there
Hmmm, Sportsman show or home and flower show?
Men will do anything to go fishin,   I'm not tellin what I do
ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha .....
Gives me an idea to set up a lingerie booth at the next boat and fishing show Roy....
Roy, thanks for being a standup guy, I just thought it was a great story the way you told it.  But  seriously, very nice bed linens ya got there.  Do they need new window treatments?
good on ya Roy ...at least your bed is still referred to as a sports field   ....my wife refers to ours as a work bench...   ahhhhhh the labour of love
